name: Strike Fighters Attack (Pro)
description:
Destroy enemies from above! Cold War air-to-ground combat flight game on the go!

Use your phone's tilt sensor to fly classic warplanes and destroy enemy forces on the ground!

* Straight to action combat flight game!
* Easy controls using accelerometer (tilt sensor)!
* Over 100 historical military attack aircraft to unlock!
* Cold War campaign covering air battles from 1954 to 1992!
* Progress through the years to unlock more advanced airplanes!
* No Ads! (Pro Edition)
* No In-app purchasing! (Pro Edition)
* No level restriction for unlocking aircraft! (Pro Edition)
* Extended campaign years (to 1992) for extra keys! (Pro Edition)
* All aircraft unlocked at level 100! (Pro Edition)

(Please note, this edition of the game does not share saved game data with the free edition).

If you have any interest in aviation, buy Strike Fighters Attack (Pro) and download it now!
